function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Frequent movement of people across the globe","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementing travel restrictions and screening measures","Technologies":"Thermal scanners, contact tracing apps","People":"Travelers, global population","Owner":"Government, healthcare authorities"},{"Description":"Antimicrobial resistance and bioterrorism threat","Impact":"Difficulties in treating infections and potential intentional spread of harmful agents","Mitigation":"Developing new antimicrobial drugs and enhancing security measures","Technologies":"Advanced diagnostics, bioterrorism detection systems","People":"Healthcare professionals, security agencies","Owner":"Pharmaceutical industry, national security agencies"},{"Description":"Limiting nosocomial spread of infection","Impact":"Reduced transmission of diseases within healthcare facilities","Mitigation":"Improved infection control measures and stringent hygiene protocols","Technologies":"Sterilization equipment, air purification systems","People":"Healthcare workers, hospital patients","Owner":"Hospital management, infection control specialists"}]}
